tool_description: Mixes multiple audio tracks together with individual level controls, panning, and bus routing to create a composite mix.

track_ids.description: Array of track IDs to mix together

track_levels.description: Volume levels for each track in dB (must match track_ids length)

master_gain.description: Master output gain in dB (-20 to +10)

auto_duck.description: Enable automatic ducking based on first track

duck_threshold.description: Ducking threshold in dB when auto_duck is enabled

error_messages: Invalid track IDs: Ensure all track_ids exist and are valid.
Array length mismatch: track_levels and pan_positions arrays must match track_ids length if provided.
Invalid level values: track_levels must be between -60 and +20 dB.
Invalid pan values: pan_positions must be between -1.0 and +1.0.
Invalid master gain: master_gain must be between -20 and +10 dB.
Unsupported mix mode: Use one of [sum, average, weighted].
Invalid duck threshold: duck_threshold must be between -60 and 0 dB.
usage: Provide track_ids array to mix. Optionally specify track_levels and pan_positions arrays, master_gain, mix_mode, and auto ducking settings.

mixed_track_id.description: Track ID of the resulting mixed audio

peak_level.description: Peak level of the mixed output in dB

rms_level.description: RMS level of the mixed output in dB

clipping_detected.description: Whether clipping was detected in the mix

duration.description: Duration of the mixed track in seconds
